segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, and it's making a big mess on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed the puddle at her feet yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really going for it, trying to get as many cookies as he can from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool he's standing on looks so unstable, like it could tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share of the cookies, reaching up towards the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman needs to turn around and see what's happening before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm and tidy compared to the chaos inside the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long the children have been doing this without getting caught by the woman.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is a bit stressful, but also kind of amusing in a way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one slips on the wet floor or falls off the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit frustrating to see the woman so unaware of what's going on around her.
segments.speaker: PAR
